alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 12:10PM EDT until April 15 at 2:56AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. .Heavy rain from the yesterday will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. At 26.0 feet, County roads near Sunnydale flood. At 27.0 feet, KY 919 flood at Underwood and Clifty Huff Roads near Narrows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 25.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 11.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.6 feet on 02/05/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tonight.
